author: cbs8
title: Global Logistics Market 2015-2019 - Dominance of integrated service providers is a Key Market Trend
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/33mnsp/global_logistics ) has announced the addition of the "Global Logistics Market 2015-2019" report to their offering.
The dominance of integrated service providers is a major trend in the market. These companies provide a full range of services and customize the services as per the requirement of the customer. In addition, the increase in export activities will propel the demand for contract logistics services during the forecast period.
According to the report, there are many drivers contributing to the growth of the market. One of the main drivers in this market is the logistics cost reduction achieved by utilizing 3PL services. By outsourcing the logistics part of their operations to 3PL providers, companies can improve the efficiency of their business by focusing on their core competencies.
Further, the report states that one of the major challenges is the high cost of operation and competitive pricing among the vendors.
The study was conducted using an objective combination of primary and secondary information including inputs from key participants in the industry. The report contains a comprehensive market and vendor landscape in addition to a SWOT analysis of the key vendors.
The global logistics market can be categorized into two segments:
By types of logistics model By industries Key vendors
DB Schenker Deutsche Post DHL Kuehne + Nagel Rhenus SNCF Logistics Key Topics Covered:
